text:
rmic has added a new -poa arg to use Portable Object Adapters; only valid if 
iop=true. We need to add it as part of the java 1.4 compatibility work

rmic -iiop -poa
creator: steve_l@iseran.com

text:
In current CVS <rmic> has a new nested element named compilerarg that will allow
you to specify extra command line parameters - you can specify -poa there.

Degrading to Enhancement as a workaround exists.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
steve_l@iseran.com
text: agreed; slipping it till the "later" timeframe
